page.title: 16Wildlife in Shoreham,Kent.
page.content:
We went to Donkey Bank and saw a {squirrel's drey with a squirrel}in a pine tree.We heard lots of{birds singing and some{hover flies.}As we looked over the motorway Andrew found a{caterpillar}hanging from a thread on an{oak tree}and a{Small Pearl Bordered {Fritillary}butterfly.On the way back we saw an{Orange Tip butterfly,a Small {White butterfly,}and a{Marbled Minor {moth.
One Monday Mrs. Hillier found a{grass {snake}in the drain of Shoreham C.P. School.Mrs. Ferguson,the headteacher, put it in a fish tank for it to swim in and wash off the clay.It was grey with a yellow bit around its neck. Its tummy was yellow with dark streaks.We saw a{frog}too.It jumped out of the tank onto Susie's foot and she screamed!
